CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 13, 1957, pg. A14 reads: "Ellis Hotel Grand Opening - These scenes show part of the huge crowd that helped celebrate the grand opening of the Ellis Hotel on Centre Ave. last week. The left photo shows the beautiful Shangri-La Lounge, packed to the hilt to hear the music of Leroy Brown's orchestra.... - Teenie Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Men and women seated at tables and booths in the Shangri-La Lounge pf the Ellis Hotel for grand opening
